version_description:
- Support Ipad
- Fixed some minor bug

We deeply appreciate for your trust in using PPCLINK's product and contributed many useful suggestions for our product in many years.
We also sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused to you by the app. We will try our best to frequently update it to bring the best quality dictionary for our customers.

- Support Ipad
- Fixed some minor bug

We also sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused to you by the app. We will try our best to frequently update it to bring the best quality dictionary for our customers.

- Support Ipad
- Fixed some minor bug

We deeply appreciate for your trust in using PPCLINK's product and contributed many useful suggestions for our product in many years.
We also sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused to you by the app. We will try our best to frequently update it to bring the best quality dictionary for our customers.

• Totally NEW INTERFACE AND USER EXPERIENCE!
• Learn new words with many Flashcard games.
• Thousands of carefully designed phrases for daily conversation and work.
• Smart, Fast and Accurate Searching.

PPCLINK would love to express our tribute for trusting us and using our English - Vietnamese - English Dictionary these recent years. If you have any questions, feedbacks or suggestions, please contact us directly at support@ppclink.com. Your feedback is worth millions to us!

Thanks so much for using English Vietnamese Dictionary by PPCLINK. We are sorry for the crash problem some users have when updating the application without removing the old version. We have fixed this issue in this update. If you still have crash problem, please remove the app before updating. For any questions and feedbacks, please send an email to us at support@ppclink.com. Thanks a bunch!
"Add note" function allows you to add note to specific words. To save the Notes from previous version, please update without deleting the app.

Thanks so much for using English - Vietnamese dictionary by PPCLINK. In this version, we feature:
- New Translation with better quality & accuracy.
- New vocabulary games which help you to learn new words faster.
- Added Basic words and TOELF word list for your learning.
- Some new UIs for better user experience.
We really hope you can continue supporting us by giving us review on Appstore and send us feedback at office@ppclink.com. Thanks so much!
